"About "Katanas".":
"Tutorial
I will explain to you about Katanas.

Samurai can not only equip a Barrette Bow, but they can also equip Katanas.
Katanas are melee weapons that use fast Consecutive Attacks."
"Press <%NormalAttack> to do a Standard Attack. Press <%NormalAttack> repeatedly and you can do a 3-Step Attack."
"Press <%NormalAttack> to do a Standard Attack. Press <%NormalAttack> repeatedly and you can do a 3-Step Attack."

"I will now explain the weapon action of Katanas. By pressing <%WeaponAction> your character will fall into a defensive stance.
That is the weapon action of Katanas: Parry.

By Parrying enemy attacks you will decrease the amount of damage you take.

However, you must be careful. Attacks that come from any direction other than directly in front of you cannot be Parried."
